sections.title: Cancellations
items: Deposits are strictly for securing your booking and cannot be refunded under any circumstance. Your deposit secures your appointment and blocks the calendar just for you.
Cancel at least {{cancellationWindowHours}} hours before your appointment and we’re happy to move your deposit to a new date.
Need to cancel inside the window? You can reschedule the next available slot.

sections.title: Rescheduling
items: You can reschedule from your confirmation email up to {{cancellationWindowHours}} hours before the appointment.
Inside the {{cancellationWindowHours}}-hour window, kindly contact LashDiary directly so we can review availability.
Each reschedule is subject to the same deposit and cancellation conditions.

sections.title: Deposits & Payments
items: A {{depositPercentage}}% deposit secures every appointment. The balance is paid in-studio after your service.
Deposits cannot be refunded under any circumstance. They can be applied to a new date when you reschedule within our policy window.
If you can’t make it, gift the slot to someone you love—just let us know so we can greet them properly.

sections.title: Referral Rewards
items: Existing clients can share their LashDiary referral code for {{referralDiscountPercent}}% off with friends.
When your friend attends, you receive {{referralRewardPercent}}% off your next appointment automatically—no need to request it.
Each referral code is single-use per friend to keep rewards meaningful for everyone.

sections.title: Returning Clients & Rebooking
items: Rebook within 30 days of your last completed, paid appointment to receive a 12% loyalty discount on your next service.
Rebook between 31 and 45 days after your last paid appointment to receive a 6% loyalty discount.
Loyalty discounts apply only to full sets—fill/infills are excluded from rebooking rewards.
Bookings placed 46 days or more after your last paid appointment do not include a loyalty discount, but once that service is completed and paid we reset the clock for future rewards.
Loyalty discounts apply only to services that have been completed and marked paid in full, and they cannot be combined with promo codes or referral offers.

sections.title: Partner Referrals
items: Partners enjoy a commission of {{salonCommissionTotalPercent}}% on each referral after the service is completed and paid in full.
Payouts are processed during the next bi-weekly cycle once the client has been successfully serviced.
You’ll receive automatic updates whenever a client books, completes a service, or when your code needs refreshing.
